      Method to give a grade to a student in a course
      Specified by:
      giveGrade in interface ProfInterface
      Parameters:
      courseID - The ID of the course for which the grade is being submitted.
      studentID - The ID of the student receiving the grade.
      grade - : the grade to be given
      prof - The `Prof` object representing the professor submitting the grade.
      course - : the course in which the grade is to be given
      student - : the student to whom the grade is to be given
      Returns:
      true if grade was successfully assigned, false otherwise
